snippet: The guitarist Rafiq Bhatia played instrumental music that owes a debt to jazz but departs in countless ways from the traditions of the genre.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews performance by guitarist Rafiq Bhatia at Cameo Gallery.
lead_paragraph: The guitarist Rafiq Bhatia played instrumental music that owes a debt to jazz but departs in countless ways from the traditions of the genre.

headline.print_headline: Transcending Real Sound in Real Time With the Unexpected
headline.seo: Rafiq Bhatia and Friends at Cameo Gallery
headline.main: Transcending Real Sound in Real Time With the Unexpected
